page.title: 181st.APPLEBY SCOUT GROUP
page.content: The{Cub pack }was formed in 1971 by Pam Cox and the{Scout Troop}formed the next year by Tom Wilkes. Meetings were held on WEDNESDAYS in the Church Hall.Numbers of boys increased to Twenty Four in each section by the late 1970's,but with changing population numbers are now 16 {CUBS}and 14 {SCOUTS.} The preasent leaders are D.Thompson (cubs), and D.Birch (scouts) with boys from Snarestone, Twycross etc,as well as APPLEBY.A timber building was donated by a BURTON FIRM, rebuilt as our HQ on a half acre site in MEASHAM ROAD (leased from the Council) and opened in 1984. { }
